name: PosteriorLenticonus
title: Posterior Lenticonus
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of posterior lenticonus.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of posterior lenticonus, including spherophakia.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to 'unspecified eye.')

concept.display: Microcornea, posterior megalolenticonus, persistent fetal vasculature, coloboma syndrome (disorder)
